name: Miimo
0:
”Alexa, ask miimo for status.”
”Alexa, Open miimo.”
”Alexa, ask miimo when is next schedule”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: miimo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mowing your lawn has never been so easy! You can now use Amazon Alexa to control your Miimo HRM1500 Live / HRM2500 Live / HRM4000 Live. Just ask Amazon Alexa to ask Miimo to cut, pause or finish. If you are curious, you can also ask Miimo where it is.

To get started, all you have to do is ensure that you have already installed your Miimo. Then simply create an Miimo account and link to your Amazon Alexa account by clicking the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app. 

Once you have successfully linked your accounts, you can start using the Miimo skill.

You can ask Miimo to mow the lawn simply by asking: 
"Alexa, ask Miimo to cut the grass"
"Alexa, ask Miimo to mow my lawn"

You can ask Miimo to return to the docking station, simply by asking:
"Alexa, ask Miimo to go home"
"Alexa, ask Miimo to return to the docking station"

If you would like to ask for status, you can say things like:
"Alexa, ask Miimo for status"
"Alexa, ask Miimo what it is doing"

If you are interested in your cutting schedule, you could ask things like:
"Alexa, ask Miimo for the schedule"
"Alexa, ask Miimo what the calendar says"
